FuncDef:
The segment-policy command applies a microsegmentation grouping policy globally.
The undo segment-policy command cancels the application of a microsegmentation grouping policy. The segment-policy command applies a microsegmentation grouping policy globally. The undo segment-policy command cancels the application of a microsegmentation grouping policy. By default, no microsegmentation grouping policy is applied to the system. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a segment policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
